dialogues.text: Sure, if the water supply were poisoned before you vaporized it. Wayne takes this in. Grave. Nods at Fox.

dialogues.speaker: EARLE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Happy Birthday, Bruce. Wayne turns to Earle.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Mr.Earle, good of you to come.

dialogues.speaker: EARLE
dialogues.text: (smiles) Not everybody thought you’d make it this far.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Sorry to disappoint. How did the stock offering go?

dialogues.speaker: EARLE
dialogues.text: Very well- the price soared.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Who was buying?

dialogues.speaker: EARLE
dialogues.text: A variety of funds and brokerages... it’s all a bit technical- the key thing is, our company’s future is secure. Wayne nods. Gestures to Fox.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Have you met Lucius Fox? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: EARLE
dialogues.text: Of course, Lucius, how are you?

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Fox is showing me the ropes down at Applied Sciences... he’s a great untapped resource at our company, aren’t you, Mr.Fox? Fox shoots Wayne a look, but Wayne WINKS and moves off.

dialogues.speaker: FOX
dialogues.text: He’s a good kid.

dialogues.speaker: EARLE
dialogues.text: (cold) Fox, forget about kissing Wayne’s ass to get back in- I’m merging Applied Sciences with central archiving and you’re top of the early retirement list... (smiles at reaction) Didn’t you get the memo?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon and the other Cops STARE at the MICROWAVE EMITTER. CoP What the hell is it? Gordon turns to the SWAT team members.

dialogues.speaker: GORDON
dialogues.text: I don’t know, but nobody gets near it, understand? wWe’re closing the bridges, locking down the whole island. INT. BEDROOM, RACHEL’S APARTMENT -- CONTINUOUS 256 Rachel STIRS. On her bed fully clothed. Trying to remembe strange dream. She sees the two vials of antidote sitting her bedside table. HURRIES to her feet.  257 122.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne moves across the party, heading for the study... An ELDERLY SOCIETY DAME grabs him-

dialogues.speaker: SOCIETY DAME
dialogues.text: Bruce, there’s somebody here you simply must meet...

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Mrs. Delane, I can’t just now... She TURNS Wayne to face an ASIAN MAN in his fifties.

dialogues.speaker: SOCIETY DAME
dialogues.text: Now, am I pronouncing it right..? In the Asian Man’s buttonhole is a DOUBLE-BLOOMED BLUE POPPY. SOCIETY DAME (CONT’D) Mr. Al Ghul? The Asian Man nods. Wayne STARES at him.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You’re not Ra’s Al Ghul. He’s dead. The Society Dame laughs nervously, confused.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: But is Ra’s Al Ghul immortal. .? Wayne TURNS. Standing there. Smiling. Ducard.

dialogues.speaker: DUCARD
dialogues.text: Are his methods supernatural. .?

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: (understanding) Or cheap parlor tricks to conceal your trues identity.., Ra’s? Ducard (THE REAL RA’S AL GHUL) smiles acknowledgment. DUCARD/RA’S AL GHUL Surely you don’t begrudge me dual identities? Ra’s Al Ghul walks Wayne through the dwindling party. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RA’S AL GHUL I’ve been admiring your work, even as it’s interfered with my plans... Ra’s Al Ghul looks at Wayne with a tinge of sadness. RA’S AL GHUL (CONT’D) You were my greatest student... until you betrayed me. Wayne notices CERTAIN GUESTS staring at him: members of t League of Shadows. Wayne looks at the departing Guests.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Your quarrel is with me. Let these people go. RA’S AL GHUL AS you wish. But they don’t have long to live- your antics at the Asylum have forced my hand...

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Crane was working for you. RA’S AL GHUL His toxin is derived from the organic compound in our blue poppies. Crane was able weaponize the compound. A brilliant scientist, but no visionary. He just wanted money and power- (smiles) I told him the plan was to hold the city to ransom... but, in fact-

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You’re going to unleash Crane’s poison on the entire city... RA’S AL GHUL (nods, serious) Then watch Gotham tear itself apart through fear...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COP CARS BLOCK the bridge. Police in RIOT GEAR, some on HORSEBACK. Rachel argues with a POLICE OFFICER. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: POLICE OFFICER
dialogues.text: Orders are, no one crosses-

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Officer, I’m a Gotham City District Attorney with information relevant to this situation- so let me pass. Rachel brushes past him. He follows, shaking his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne and Ra’s enter. The library is empty of guest.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You’re going to destroy millions of lives. RA’S AL GHUL No. Billions of lives. Gotham is just the beginning. The world will watch in terror as the greatest city falls. Anarchy and chaos will spread... mankind will ravage itself, the species will be culled and the balance of nature restored. The planet will be saved for all species. Wayne stares at Ra’s appalled.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You’re inhuman. RA’S AL GHUL Don’t question my humanity, Brucewhen I found you in that fetid hole you were lost. I saved you- I showed you a path and took away your fear- I made you what you are. (stares at Wayne) And in return... you attacked me and burned my home... Ra’s looks up at his MEN in the gallery. Nods. The Men st SETTING FIRE TO THE DRAPES. RA’S AL GHUL (CONT’D) Since then, you’ve used my skills and techniques to interfere with my plans, plans in which you were supposed to play a part... (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: What part was that, Ra’s? To put my company at your disposal? To obtain your microwave emitter and plant it somewhere in Gotham? RA’S AL GHUL (smiles, nods) You were supposed to be Gotham’s destroyer... instead you became her only protector.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: You underestimate Gotham. RA’S AL GHUL You underestimate Gotham’s corruptionwe’ve infiltrated every aspect of the city’s infrastructure...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four SWATS are guarding the Emitter. One of them checks h watch. Gives a signal to the SECOND SWAT who nods and sta priming the machine... The Third SWAT turns-

dialogues.speaker: THIRD SWAT
dialogues.text: Hey! What the hell are you- PHUUUT. The Fourth SWAT has shot him with a silenced pist Moving with military precision, the three Ninja/SWATS don gas masks place explosive charges along the wall. 110.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TRAIN DRIVER checks his watch. Hits the INTERCOM.

dialogues.speaker: TRAIN DRIVER
dialogues.text: (over loudspeaker ) This train is no longer in service. PASSENGERS groan, get to their feet.  126.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FLAMES ARE RISING. SMOKE GATHERING at the ceiling... RA’S AL GHUL Gotham is helpless without you. That’s why I’m here.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: To kill me? Ra’s Al Ghul looks at Wayne. Emotional. RA’S AL GHUL To bring you back to us, Bruce. The world will need great men like you-

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: To take power. RA’S AL GHUL This is not about power... this is about saving the planet before man destroys it with his greed, with his pollution, with his weaponry... Ra’s holds out his hand. A Ninja THROWS him a SWORD. He HANDS it to Wayne, placing the point at his own throat. RA’S AL GHUL (CONT’D) You still doubt me? Apply a few pounds of pressure... buy your precious city a reprieve. Ra’s looks into Wayne’s eyes with absolute conviction. RA’S AL GHUL (CONT’D) Kill me. Then you’11 understand how simple it is to do what’s necessary. Wayne holds the sword at Ra’s throat. Thinking. Ra’s star at Wayne with absolute conviction.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I will not take life. I will not be a part of this. RA’S AL GHUL But you already are. You’ve given Gotham a potent symbol of fear... (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I frighten criminals. RA’S AL GHUL You frighten everybody. A giant vengeful bat? What better apocalyptic symbol to haunt Gothams’ dreams as panic takes hold? Wayne stares at Ra’s Al Ghul. Pulls the sword away from h throat. Ra’s Al Ghul looks at him, contemptuous. Pulls at the handle of his cane, producing a SWORD. RA’S AL GHUL (CONT’D) Then die with Gotham- Ra’s STRIKES Wayne’s sword from his throat- lays into him sword in one hand, CANE/SHEATH in the other-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon turns. Rachel is there. He nods.

dialogues.speaker: GORDON
dialogues.text: How are you?

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Better. Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: GORDON
dialogues.text: Thank the Batman.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: I already did. (reaches into pocket) He sent me with doses of the antidote for you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Ninja/SWATS crouch away from the back wall. One of th HITS a DETONATOR. A controlled EXPLOSION BLASTS a large h in the back wall-  265 266 267 268 269 128.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Cops react to the EXPLOSION- Gordon RACES into the building...

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Gordon, wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon and his men appear at the door to the room- the Ninja/SWATS are moving the Emitter through the hole in th wall- Gordon OPENS FIRE- the First Ninja/Swat turns to th second, SIGNALS... The Second Ninja/Swat ACTIVATES the Emitter- A PULSE OF

dialogues.speaker: ENERGY RIPPLES FROM THE MACHINE... PIPES/TAPS/DRAINS EXPL
dialogues.text: with pressurized STEAM- Gordon DIVES for cover-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Manhole covers EXPLODE, RELEASING GEYSERS of STEAM. FIRE HYDRANTS EXPLODE, HISSING with steam- Cops hit the deck..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An ALARM SOUNDS- the Technician points at a DOT on the ma

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: What’s that?!

dialogues.speaker: SECOND TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: Some kind of pressure under the Narrows... like the water’s... (confused) ... boiling.

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: Did the valves hold?

dialogues.speaker: SECOND TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: Yeah, it’s contained. For now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cops STARE at the cloud of FOG rising from the island.  270 271 129.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ra’s throws himself at Wayne with FEROCITY and SKILL- Way PARRIES, THRUSTS... WAVES of flame ROLL across the high ceiling as the great room approaches flashover point... Wayne PRESSES Ra’s back under the gallery... Ra’s THRUSTS OFF BALANCE- Wayne dodges- Ra’s goes DOWN- Wayne holds hi sword at Ra’s throat...

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Perhaps you taught me too well. Ra’s looks up at Wayne with a sly smile. RA’S AL GHUL Or perhaps you’1l never learn- A section of the BURNING GALLERY DROPS onto Wayne. RA’S AL GHUL (CONT’D) -to mind your surroundings as well as your opponent. Ra’s RISES. Looks down at Wayne, unconscious, PINNED unde BURNING TIMBERS. Firelight flickers on Ra’s’ face as he sheathes his sword/cane. RA’S AL GHUL (CONT’D) Rest easy, friend. Ra’s turns, walks out of the flaming library.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ra’s walks out of the burning building. Motions to a Ninj RA’S AL GHUL No one comes out. Make sure. He walks towards a waiting HELICOPTER. Another Ninja follows. RA’S AL GHUL (CONT’D) Is everything ready?

dialogues.speaker: NINJA 2
dialogues.text: They created a smokescreen in the Narrows- and they’re moving the emitter into place for your run.  272 273 274 275 276 130.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Train Driver looks down at Arkham as he pulls overhea with his empty train. He STOPS the train above the Narrow

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thick clouds of WHITE FOG fill the room. Gordon is

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Gordon, it’s me! It’s Rachel! I have the antidote! Gordon- Gordon RIPS his arm away- COUGHING, SPLUTTERING... he STA into the BLINDING WHITE... TERRIFIED, adrenaline kicking Rachel SHAKES Gordon, FUMBLING with the pneumatic syringe RACHEL (CONT’D) Stay calm... I can help you... Gordon looks at the needle, panicked. Then at her face...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne, unconscious, PINNED by burning timbers, FLAMES RISING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Ninja guards the side door, STARING into the flames... WHACK! He goes down... ALFRED is standing there, nine iro in hand. He looks down at the Ninja.

dialogues.speaker: ALFRED
dialogues.text: I sincerely hope you’re not from the fire department. Alfred rushes in to the burning house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred moves to Wayne, tries in vain to shift the BURNING WOOD from Wayne’s chest. He moves to Wayne’s face. SLAPS HARD.

dialogues.speaker: ALFRED
dialogues.text: Master Wayne! Master Wayne!! Wayne’s eyes flicker open. He PUSHES, but can’t move. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 277 278 279 280 281 CONTINUED: (2) 131. ALFRED (CONT’D) (exasperated) Sir, whatever is the point of all those push-ups if you can’t even- Wayne GLARES at Alfred, FORCES the weight from his chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne and Alfred push through the burning room. Wayne JAB at the flaming piano keys...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred and Wayne CRAWL onto the lift.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The burning house COLLAPSES. .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smoke and flame EXPLODES through the passage- Alfred YANK the lever DROPPING them out of the heat- they SPEED DOWN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LANDING HARD. Smoldering. Wayne STARES up the SPIRAL: hig above, SPARKS and firelight. The CRASH of collapsing TIMB echoes down as WAYNE MANOR DIES. Tears form in Wayne’s ey

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: (whispers) What have I done, Alfred? Everything my family... everything my Father and his father built... Alfred struggles to pull himself to a standing position.

dialogues.speaker: ALFRED
dialogues.text: (hoarse) The Wayne legacy is more than bricks and mortar, sir. Wayne stares up at the glowing shaft. Lost in his despair (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I thought I could... help Gotham... but I’ve failed... Alfred makes a futile show of dusting down his jacket.

dialogues.speaker: ALFRED
dialogues.text: And why do we fall, sir? Wayne looks at Alfred’s bruised, smudged, yet dignified face. ALFRED (CONT’D) So that we might better learn to pick ourselves up. Wayne looks up at his old friend.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Still haven’t given up on me? Alfred offers him a trembling hand.

dialogues.speaker: ALFRED
dialogues.text: (conviction) Never. Wayne takes Alfred’s hand. Gets up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ninjas in gas masks move the Emitter into position UNDER MONORAIL TRAIN. The bind it into a HOIST.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel injects Gordon. He stares into her eyes, questioni

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Breathe. Just breathe. NOISES draw Gordon’s frightened eyes to shape of COPS choking on the fog, SHOUTING. FIGHTING. Rachel pulls Gord to his feet- heads for the hole in the wall... RACHEL (CONT’D) Come on.  284 285 286 287 288 289 133.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loeb and a LIEUTENANT get out of a car at the blockade. Starring across: FOG HANGS OVER THE ISLAND.

dialogues.speaker: LOEB
dialogues.text: What in God’s name is going on in there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Rioters FLIT past through the fog either side, Rachel DRAGS Gordon into a doorway... She looks up into the fog. Sees the Ninjas hoisting the emitter up to the monorail..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An INMATE at the window of his cell. A CLUNK- he turns- h cell door is OPEN. He looks out into the corridors...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crane, in Scarecrow mask, RINGS down the corridor, LAUGHI unlocked each door in turn.

dialogues.speaker: INMATE
dialogues.text: (to himself) Scarecrow. Inmates emerge from their cells, confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON: black scalloped GAUNTLETS thrust onto purposefu hands. A dark CLOAK whipped around strong shoulders. A graphite COWL placed over an implacable face. A DARK FIGURE swallowed by the gloom. BATS flutter as an ENGINE ROARS to life...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MOVING IN on water tumbling hypnotically... The Batmobile EXPLODES through the water, ROCKETING onto opposite bank.  290 291 292 293 294 134.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ra’s Al Ghul puts on a gas mask as the helicopter descend

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel sits up from Gordon. Hears something: a DRAGGING NOISE behind her. She turns, stepping away from Gordon... A HORSE emerges from the fog. Crane is riding; in Scarecr mask. DRAGGING along behind, boot caught in the stirrup, dead MOUNTED POLICEMAN. CRANE TURNS TO RACHEL.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Crane! Crane shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hisses) Scarecrow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loeb with a LIEUTENANT, watching the fog hang over the island. They head a massive ENGINE, turn, BLINDED by headlights.. the Batmobile RACES at the cordon, SHOOTS over the cars, clipping the roofs, Cops DIVING out of the way...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The too-wide Batmobile RIPS metal sheets and drywall from both sides of the tiny alley- RIOTING INHABITANTS run SCREAMING- the Batmobile is heading for a dead end...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crane GALLOPS towards Rachel and Gordon and STOPS. Rioter emerge behind them... he REARS UP to STAMP RACHEL AND

dialogues.speaker: GORDON -
dialogues.text: Rachel fires her taser, plugging Crane in the face- he JERKS, SPASM- the HORSE BOLTS, THROWING him, DRAGGING HIM OFF INTO THE FOG.. Rachel watches him disappear. Then sees the Lunatics clos in on all sides... (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 295 CONTINUED: (2) 135. The Batmobile SMASHES THROUGH THE WALL- Lunatics closing on all sides... The Batmobile opens- Batman emerges- runs to Rachel... A BRICK smashes into Batman’s head. He TURNS to the Riote STARING at him, TERRIFIED. Batman RISES in the mist... to their eyes: Batman is a twelve-foot shadowy devil with WINGS... They fling bricks, bottles, fighting off the demon. Batma GRABS Rachel, FIRES his grappling gun up into the fog... finds purchase- they SHOOT UP FROM THE MOB-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman sets Rachel down, looks out at Gotham: the Narrows below steaming, burning, screaming. The rest of Gotham WAITS.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: They’re going to unleash the toxin on the entire city. I have to find the microwave emitter...

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: They were lifting a machine up to the tracks... Batman TURNS to face Rachel, realizing-

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: Of course- the monorail. The track runs directly over the water Mains... Batman turns to the city, stares at the wide sweep of the monorail tracks. The "spoke" that lead in to Wayne Tower. BATMAN (CONT’D) He’s going to drive that thing straight into Wayne Tower and blow the main hub, creating enough toxin to blanket the entire city...  296 297 298 299 136.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ra’s Al Ghul climbs onto the train with three MASKED NINJ The narrow-band emitter fills the front car. Pulsing with energy. Ra’s moves to the driver’s position...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon looks up- the train moves overhead... as it passes manhole covers EXPLODE in its wake, sending up fresh GEYS of STEAM... Gordon watches the train go... starts RUNNING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALARMS sound- the Technician looks at the map- lights FLA

dialogues.speaker: SECOND TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: What’s that?

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: The pressure’s increasing... and it’s... Moving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman stands at the edge- looks at the IMPOSSIBLE DROP t the moving monorail train...

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Wait! Batman TURNS. Rachel stares at his eyes in the black cowl reaches up to his face. RACHEL (CONT’D) You could die. At least tell me your name. Batman turns. Looks back at her.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: It’s not who I am underneath... (touches his chest) But what I do that defines me. Rachel steps forward, recognizing her own words, REALIZIN

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Bruce- But he is already FALLING...  300 301 302 303 304 137.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman FREE FALLS, cloak flapping, sliding his gloves int the activating pockets... The cloak goes RIGID- SMASHING THE WIND LIKE A PARACHUTE. Batman’s arms CONTROL his cloak, not simply arresting his fall, but GLIDING GRACEFULLY like a hand glider... He eyes the moving train and NOSES DOWN, ACCELERATING-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ra’s pulls off his mask, watching the city speed around h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flass is in the driver’s seat, eating. Gordon opens the d GRABS him-

dialogues.speaker: FLASS
dialogues.text: What the-? -FLINGS him out onto the asphalt- PEELS OUT... 120.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman STREAKS DOWN, CUTTING through the STEAM GEYSERS shooting up in the train’s wake... the train SPEEDS throu a station- Batman BANKS SHARPLY around the building...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Technician stares at the map: BLINKING LIGHTS reach CLOSER AND CLOSER to Wayne Tower...

dialogues.speaker: SECOND TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: Pressure’s building at the hub-

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: Open all the run-off valves!

dialogues.speaker: SECOND TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: They’re already blown! The Technician, worried, looks at a PRESSURE GAUGE: the NEEDLE is moving steadily HIGHER, towards the RED ZONE...  305 306 307 308 309 138.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The track ahead passes into an office building- Batman no down- trying to get down onto the train before it reaches the building... Batman gets OVER the back of the train-it at the mouth of the tunnel- he COLLAPSES his cloak- DROPS onto the train just as it BLASTS into the building-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ra’s hears a THUMP. He nods at his Ninjas. They move into the rear car, COCKING machine guns...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman lies on the roof- the train SPEEDS through the CANYONS of downtown Gotham... BULLETS tear through the ro several HIT BATMAN- JOLTING him loose, spinning his

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ninjas see a SHADOW FALL FROM THE ROOF. One of them sticks his head up to check: nothing but fresh bullet hol At the Ninjas’ feet, UNNOTICED, a GRAPPLING HOOK sticks through the FLOOR of the train-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small CROWD outside a store watch news on stacked T.V.’ The train STREAKS overhead. People look up, SHOCKED to se Batman HANGING FROM THE TRAIN BY HIS GRAPPLING CABLE, FLY ALONG, 15 feet in the air, dodging STOPLIGHTS and AWNINGS The Train crosses over a busy intersection- Batman FLIES over CARS, between tall TRUCKS... behind him, in the trai wake, manhole covers EXPLODE, fire hydrants BURST... Batman STRUGGLES to fasten his grappling gun into his utility belt, but he’s being TOSSED too violently... Up ahead: more of Ra’s Al Ghul’s Ninjas ride in a truck preceding the train, guarding the monorail supports.  310 311 312 139.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the truck, a Ninja puts a rocket-propelled grenade launcher on his shoulder, sighting Batman- the others aim their guns. A CURVE in the truck sends Batman SWINGING UP into the gl facade of a building, SMASHING ALONG THROUGH forty feet o plate glass... he clears the glass, looks ahead- sees the truck in his path, WEAPONS TRAINED ON HIM... The machine guns open up- the TRIGGER of the RPG is

dialogues.speaker: SQUEEZED -
dialogues.text: BLAM- with a SHUDDER the truck is KNOCKED SIDEWAYS by a SPEEDING unmarked sedan- the grenade MISFIRES into the cab... GORDON is at the wheel of the unmarked sedan- he DUCKS DO the truck EXPLODES... Batman FLIES THROUGH THE FLAMES... On the other side, the track DEAD ENDS at another tunnel. Gordon looks up in time to see Batman LATCH the grappling gun into his belt- SHOOT UP, SKIRTING the lip of the tunnel...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman JUMPS into the rear car- FIRES his grappling gun a Ninja’s leg, YANKS him DOWN... Ra’s glances back from the front car, but can’t see clear Batman DOWNS a Ninja with an ELBOW to the head. LEAPS for the door between cars- a Ninja in the front car LOCKS it- SMASH- Ra’s TURNS to see Batman at the rear door, glass falling from the window, hands around the Ninja’s THROAT. RA’S AL GHUL You! Batman DROPS the Ninja. LEADS UP out of sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALARMS: The technician watches the blinking lights move CLOSE to the HUB... the pressure gauge needle tips into t

dialogues.speaker: RED-
dialogues.text: (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 313 CONTINUED: (2) 140.

dialogues.speaker: FIRST TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: Everybody out! Out of the building! !

dialogues.speaker: SECOND TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: But -

dialogues.speaker: FIRST TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: We’re sitting on the hub- she’s gonna blow and blow big, understand?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman moves forward along the roof, cloak FLAPPING madly behind. Wayne Tower visible up ahead, the train STREAKING DIZZYINGLY through the tight CANYONS of Gotham... Ra’s Al Ghul climbs up onto the roof at the front of the train. Standing tall before Gotham, long coat blowing aro his legs. He marvels at Batman. RA’S AL GHUL You took my advice about theatricality a bit literally, don’t you think? He draws his sword from his cane. Batman LUNGES at Ra’s, SWINGS his sword at him- Batman PARRIES with his gauntlet SPARKS striking off the metal scallops. The train SHOOTS through a building, the airflow WHUMPING down on the duelists... Ra’s SWINGS his cane- Batman TRAPS it in his scallop- TWI his arm- sends the cane SPINNING away. RA’S AL GHUL (CONT’D) Familiar... Ra’s THRUSTS his sword at Batman’s chest, Batman DODGES left, dangerously close to the EDGE. He DUCKS at Ra’s, wh KNEES him sideways, SWINGING him at the FRONT EDGE of the train... Batman REGAINS FOOTING- Ra’s STRIKES DOWN at his head... Batman CROSSES HIS ARMS, CATCHING THE SWORD in the scallo of BOTH gauntlets, HOLDING FAST... RA’S AL GHUL (CONT’D) Don’t you have anything new? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: How about this? Batman YANKS his ARMS in OPPOSITE directions, BREAKING RA AL GHUL’S SWORD IN Two. Ra’s STUMBLES back, loses footing, SLIPS onto the roof, SLIDING back toward the rear... Batman looks ahead to Wayne Tower approaching...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The first technician watches the pressure gauge needle sl up through the red. He CLOSES HIS EYES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batman leans over the front of train- FIRES his GRAPPLING GUN into the front GUIDE WHEELS- which JAM, SPARKING, GRINDING... cable SPOOLS out of the grappling gun... the train SHUDDERS... RA’S AL GHUL (climbing to his feet) What’re you doing?! ! Batman THROWS the grappling gun at the SPARKING guide wheel...

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: What’s necessary. The guide wheel HITS the grappling gun- BUMPS OFF ITS TRACK... Ra’s DIVES onto Batman- SMASHES him against the roof- the train LURCHES, SCRAPING against the concrete guiderails.. Batman ROLLS Ra’s onto the bottom- but Ra’s is CHOKING Batman, THUMBS PUSHED DEEP INTO THE FLESH ABOVE BATMAN’S NECKPIECE... Batman STRUGGLES uselessly against Ra’s Al Ghul IRON GRIP RA’S AL GHUL Are you afraid?! ! Ra’s looks up at Batman’s DYING eyes... Batman’s hands ST PUSHING against Ra’s... (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: (choked) Yes... ...and slip down his cloak to the activating pockets- BATMAN (CONT’D) ...but not of you. The cloak goes RIGID- CATCHES THE WIND- like pulling a ri cord- Batman YANKED from Ra’s Al Ghul’s hands, INTO THE AIR... Ra’s SCREAMS as he rides the train OFF THE MONORAIL...

dialogues.speaker: FLYING, PARKED CARS EXPLODING...
dialogues.text: The Train has disintegrated into burning rubble just shor of the entrance to Wayne Station...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Technician opens one eye. Then the other. And starts breathing again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Massive fiery destruction. And above it all- Batman SOARS in a high bank, riding the thermals, staring down at Ra’s Al Ghul’s funeral pyre... And we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Construction CREWS clear the RUBBLE, Lucius Fox, in hard hat, supervises. Earle approaches, livid. Fox spots him.

dialogues.speaker: FOX
dialogues.text: This is a hard hat area.

dialogues.speaker: EARLE
dialogues.text: What are you doing here, Fox? I seem to remember firing you. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 319 CONTINUED: (2) 143.

dialogues.speaker: FOX
dialogues.text: Might be something to do with my new job as head of Wayne Industries. (off look) Didn’t you get the memo? Earle stares at Fox, hard.

dialogues.speaker: EARLE
dialogues.text: Whose authority? Fox points at Wayne’s Rolls Royce idling nearby. Earle strides towards it. Fox quietly smiles, turns to his work

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earle is BANGING on the window. Wayne rolls it down.

dialogues.speaker: EARLE
dialogues.text: You think you have authority to decide who runs this company, Bruce?

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: It is my company.

dialogues.speaker: EARLE
dialogues.text: Not anymore. Wayne Industries went public a week ago-

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: And I bought most of the shares. A controlling interest, in fact. (off look) Through various charitable foundations, trusts and so forth... Alfred is smiling in the front seat. WAYNE (CONT’D) Look, it’s all a bit technical, but the important thing is.... my company’s future is secure. Earle is speechless. Wayne smiles. The Rolls pulls away.  320 321 322 323 144.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WORKERS sift through the smoking ruins, supervised by Alfred.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Soot-stained glass crunches underfoot as Rachel picks her way through the smoking remnants of the greenhouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rachel finds Wayne hammering a board across the disused well. He looks up at her. She approaches. He turns to the well.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Do you remember the day I fell?

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Of course. Wayne looks down at the black gap yet to be covered.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: As I lay there, I knew... I could sense it...

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: That things would never be the same.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: What did you find down there? Wayne picks up another board.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Childhood’s end. Wayne places the board over over the gap. Closing the wel

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wayne walks Rachel past the ruins. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: The day you left Gotham... the day Chill was murdered... I said terrible things.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: True things. You made me see that justice is about more than my own pain and anger.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Well, you proved me wrong.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: About what?

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: Your father would be proud of you. Just as I am. Wayne looks at her, emotion rising. He takes Rachel in hi arms and they kiss, passionately... desperately. They break, Wayne looks into Rachel’s eyes, hopeful. But gently shakes her head. RACHEL (CONT’D) (soft) Between Batman and Bruce Wayne, there’s no room for me.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Rachel, this life I chose... I can give it up. Rachel reaches up to his face with her hand.

dialogues.speaker: RACHEL
dialogues.text: You didn’t choose the life, Bruce. It was thrust upon you, the way greatness often is. You’ve given this city hope- now she’s depending on you. We all are. Wayne looks at her. Aching. He nods. RACHEL (CONT’D) Good-bye, Bruce. She walks away. Stops. Turns. Points at the ruins. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 324 CONTINUED: (3) 146. RACHEL (CONT’D) What will you do? Wayne looks at her. Glorious purpose in his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: I’m going to rebuild it just the way it was. Brick for brick. Rachel nods. Walks off. Wayne stares after her. Alone... But Alfred is at Wayne’s shoulder. Watching his gaze.

dialogues.speaker: ALFRED
dialogues.text: Just the way it was, sir? Wayne turns to Alfred.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: Yes, why? They stroll, side by side, towards the smoking ruins.

dialogues.speaker: ALFRED
dialogues.text: I thought we might take the opportunity of making some improvements to the foundation.

dialogues.speaker: WAYNE
dialogues.text: In the south east corner?

dialogues.speaker: ALFRED
dialogues.text: Precisely, sir.

dialogues.speaker: DISSOLVE TO
dialogues.text: The irregular SHADOW of a BAT SYMBOL cast up onto turbule clouds... and we are-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gordon sips coffee from a styrofoam cup. Beside him- an upturned spotlight with a METAL STENCIL bolted to it. A dark FLUTTERING, and Batman is standing the other side the spotlight. He reaches out, taps the stencil.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: Nice. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: GORDON
dialogues.text: (crushing his cup) Couldn’t find any mob bosses to strap to the light. Gordon kills the searchlight. The two men stand opposite each other in the dark.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: Well, Sergeant?

dialogues.speaker: GORDON
dialogues.text: It’s Lieutenant, now. Commissioner Loeb had to promote me. And he had to disband the task force hunting you. Amazing what saving a city can do for your image.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: Then things are better.

dialogues.speaker: GORDON
dialogues.text: (nods) You’ve started something- bent cops running scared, hope on the streets... Gordon leaves his sentence hanging between them.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: But?

dialogues.speaker: GORDON
dialogues.text: But there’s a lot of weirdness out there right now... the Narrows is dost... we still haven’t picked up Crane or half the inmates of Arkham that he freed...

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: We will. Gotham will return to normal.

dialogues.speaker: GORDON
dialogues.text: Will it? What about escalation?

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: Escalation?

dialogues.speaker: GORDON
dialogues.text: We start carrying semiautomatics, they buy automatics... we start wearing kevlar, they buy armorpiercing rounds... (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: And? Gordon leans closer to Batman. Points at him.

dialogues.speaker: GORDON
dialogues.text: And... you’re wearing a mask and jumping off rooftops... Gordon fishes in his pocket. GORDON (CONT’D) Take this guy... He pulls out a clear plastic evidence bag. GORDON (CONT’D) ...armed robbery, double homicide... Inside the clear plastic bag is a PLAYING CARD. GORDON (CONT’D) Got a taste for theatrics, like you... Gordon hands Batman the bag. GORDON (CONT’D) Leaves a calling card. Batman turns the card over. It is a JOKER.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: I’11 look into it. He steps up onto the balustrade. Gordon looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: GORDON
dialogues.text: I never said thank you. Batman looks out at the lights of Gotham. Cloak billowing around him.

dialogues.speaker: BATMAN
dialogues.text: And you’1l1 never have to. Batman DROPS from the rooftop, GLIDING on the night wind. Gordon smiles. He can’t help it.

dialogues.speaker: FADE OUT
dialogues.text: (CONTINUED)
